评论概述: Very Thick - Think Coat, Not Hoodie
评论详情: Very thick, very warm but feels like I'm wearing a coat, if I'm honest. Also, the sizing is a bit large. I normally wear an XL (to be comfy and not snug), but I could have gotten an L instead. If you need something to wear on cold days, this will do the job. You can layer it under a larger coat on really cold days, but if the temperature hovers around 50 or 60 degrees then THIS is your coat. Full stop. Also, I hear people comment on the zipper and they're not wrong, the zipper is a little difficult but after wearing it for awhile it seems to have become easier. I also hang it in the closet with the zipper all the way up, which helps.
The zipper stopped working after a month.  Don't wear it anymore.

However, a few months in and the metal zipper broke, and I haven’t worn it religiously, maybe a couple of times a week over about a month and a halfs time. I’m past the return window according to what I read. So buyer beware, you may purchase a jacket that will fail a few months into its use and be stuck with something unwearable.
